p: The study was performed on crude methanolic extract of E. suberosa (Roxb) bark and its organic fractions. All equipment used in the following study were clean and incubated for 5min at 37°C. A total volume of 100 μL reaction mixture was prepared containing 60 µL of disodium phosphate of 50-mM concentration (as a buffer with 7.7 pH value), test sample having volume of 10 μL with 0.5mM concentration and enzyme having volume of 10 μL with 0.005 concentration
